long_description: Designed to protect you from the sun's rays, the REI Sahara hat for women has a wide brim to shade your face during a day spent playing outdoors. With a UPF 50+ rating, nylon fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Wide brim provides ample sun protection and has a foam insert to help the hat retain its shape and float in water. Polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. The REI Sahara hat has a chinstrap to secure the hat when the wind picks up.
short_description: Designed to protect you from the sun's rays, the REI Sahara hat for women has a wide brim to shade your face during a day spent playing outdoors.
